Description.LocalizedString: Open shirt Felix was a good start but he needs to go fully shirtless.
Meg mains need boops too
First match does not count unless the killer brings a mori
Twitter on release day is everything! #DeadbyDaylgiht
I just woke up on a cold October morning and BOOP! I was the new Dead by Daylight survivor!?
It's one thing to create trailers for an audience, but getting to see the fans dissect every trailer we put out for anything hidden makes working on Dead by Daylight that much sweeter!
The Ringu chapter was the first major chapter I got to work on, so Sadako will always have a special place in my heart <3
A great monster design is one that makes you question its intentions, but true monsters are all about the act!
Most people might have nightmares with monsters chasing them, but I fear to be the monster in mines.
Da da dum, dum, dum... another bug bites the dust...
Me as the QA team carries me through yet another playtest

It was a blast to work on the Hellraiser chapter! Without having seen the movies prior to finding out we were going to work with the license, I knew exactly who Pinhead was â€“ specifically because I was terrified of the VHS cover when I was a kid.

Before the PTB, anticipation is always very high. It was amazing to see all the reactions. Sadako is such a horror icon and I never would have imagined I'd get the honour to work on such an awesome character!

In 2019, I heard about the Hellraiser franchise for the first time and was so creeped out like "I'll never go near those movies!" In 2021, I was so happy to start working at Behaviour... on Dead by Daylight's Hellraiser chapter! Demon to 2019 me, Angel to 2021 me!

Working on Mikaela and the whole The Midnight Grove event made Halloween 2021 the most Halloweeny Halloween of my life! Keep that cauldron boiling and the book of spells close by... Wanna go Trick or Treating? Play Dead by Daylight, you get both!!
Blood sacrifice every morning = great internet
I pray to Khorne everytime I submit code, does that count ?
The Dev team really wanted to have this chapter: we had to put a Ringu on it.
Did you know that Moira Rose could have starred as Carmina Mora in Portrait of a Murder?
I wonder if Dr. Horrible would make a great outfit for our old friend, The Doctor.

When I was being interviewed @ BHVR I was asked what my dream chapter would be. I said Ringu without hesitation. Seeing it come to fruition, w/ the love that was poured into it, and expanding the world's lore with Yoichi has been an absolute joy.

The creation of IntoTheRainbow. As a Queer person, It meant so much to be able to work on an event like that w/the team. To see the community band together, raise money for charity, and showcase incredible LGBTQIA2s+ streamers & Fog Whisperers was <3
Chocolatine.
They wouldn't let me be a character in the game, they said there was already a cannibal...
Why did the chicken cross the road? The hatch was on the other side. Get it? Cause it's a hatch...
Whenever I'm getting ready for a vacation, other players always end up sending me to Ormond
I can only imagine how hot those desks are right now with all three dev kits stacked on top of each other...
Well, well, well. It is that time again. Anyone for Sadako playtest?
Something smells like crispy semiconductors...it's quite possible that I will disappear unexpectedly today.

It was such a killer experience bringing Sadako to life! Pun wholeheartedly intended. I watched the original Ringu several times to stay as true as possible to her original sound design - which was a pleasure because the movie is great, and its sound is fantastic!

The box â€” you opened it, and he came! Bringing Pinhead's iconic voice lines to the gameplay experience may have had some hiccups, but it was so worth to hear Doug Bradley in game! Did you know one of his voice lines will only trigger in one of 2 very specific circumstances? You shall not escape!
It was so cool to be able to bring the Chatterer to Dead by Daylight alongside Pinhead - like his teeth clattering sfx? They're real teeth! - nothing else sounded quite right.
Don't tell the others, but you're my favourite person in this match.
"Hey, can you come over here and puke on me real quick?" is not something I expected to hear at work. But here we are.
I was going to tell a joke about Coldwind Farm, but it's too corny.
Yeah. She scared us, too.
I've been working on a really great quote for the Anniversary. Not ready to share any details right now but you'll hear more soon!
Remember to play with your food
If Sadako gave you a heart attack from her jump scares... that was from me!
A Jake in PJs means business
Hot dogs and Waffles!
Fun fact - A lot of the recent characters we've released have been voiced by incredibly talented metal vocalists!
A real gentleman is a killer who turns his head after hooking a lady.
We miss you, Peter <3
My girlfriend is easy to scare when playing Dead by Daylight... Yes... Even when she's the Killer...
Look at that dream team! They can take on any monsters coming their way... Nemesis who?
Seeing Resident Evil join the Dead by Daylight roster has been the highlight of the year for me. Oh, I love the smell of zombies in the morning!
I've always loved that image of The Deathslinger. I can definitely hear him say "Get off my lawn!"
I can only lament at how many bugs this guy's box caused me.
This dude unhooks your girl on the final gen, wyd?
The amount of true horror icons still finding their way into the fog is amazing! Who's next?
Whenever our licensed characters get some cosmetic love or even extra lore in The Archives, I'm very excited!
Have you ever wondered who observes the Observer?
I think we may have created an irrational fear of real life snowmen with this event... Well done, team!
The S.T.A.R.S. are shining in Dead by Daylight! This was a huge highlight for me as a Resident Evil fan. If you missed it from the Anniversary broadcast, expect more Resident Evil in the future! ;)
It's nice to hop into games and know I'm among family when I see all the Pride charms, even if it's decorating the hook I'm hanging from.
If you see a Survivor named "INEED4PALLETSTUNS", it's me and I'm still stuck on the last Tome I Survivor Master Challenge. Just let me pallet stun you four times, you bullies.
Felix in this outfit makes me SWEAT
Thanks to all of our fans around the world!!
Nothing's better than a big steak. Maybe 2 big steaks.
Happy Belated/Early Birthday!
I love a cheesy pizza. It's brie-lliant to share with friends or even when you're prov-alone.
OINK

In doing the research needed to design the Trapper update in 5.3.0, I came to love playing him. There is little as satisfying in Dead by Daylight as hearing a Survivor step on a Bear-Trap. There are so many clever tricks you can do with Bear-Trap placement!

One of the coolest things I've gotten to work on recently was my idea to have the Legion's Mixtapes change their music. The audio team and the composer knocked that one right out of the park! Thanks so much for bringing it to life, Fred and Michel!
Reworking Ghost Face sent me into the DEPTHS of the Ghost Face fandom, and WOW! New fav killer.
Confession: Killer main because I get too scared to hit skill checks when I hear a heartbeat (especially against Doctor)

Legion is my favorite killer on Dead by Daylight. When they told me that I was going to work on his rework, I was very happy! I really enjoyed working on it and I like the final result! I hope you have fun playing with it!

The introduction of the All-Kill chapter was my favorite. The video was beautiful and the music was amazing! When this DLC came out, I told my mom to look at it and since then The Trickster is her favorite Killer. When I play as or against him, my mother comes to watch the match!

What an incredible year! Thanks to my awesome colleagues and to all of you for being such a great community! I love working on this game and I still love playing it! If you see a bambi playing with a flashlight and a pink bunny outfit, that's probably me!

We rack our brains every day to convert all information to funny, humorous, and casual messages to deliver to you. Smiling is the key to a happy life! May your life be filled with smiles and laughs, whether you're playing video games or not.

Sadako is very popular in Japan as there are a lot who know her. It was a long-cherished desire to invite her into the Fog for many Japanese players, including myself. I'll never forget the reaction in and out of the community when we announced it!
I'll never forget that our pun-filled Valentine's Day cards (that we racked our brains to come up with) became actual merch and were sold in Japan!
Don't worry, everything is gonna be all-Dwight!
"Needs more cake"
"Well that's the spirit!"
Where's the cake? I SAID IT NEEDS MORE CAKE!
Is Charlotte technically Victor's house? These are the kind of questions that keep me up at night ...
I started playing Dead by Daylight in 2016 and now I get to be a part of this amazing team - It's an honor and a privilege!
When it comes to our characters, less is more - clothing that is :)
I love working on teasers where I get to hide things for the community to find. Who knew adding a needle into a screenshot would cause such a ruckus?
In loving memory of Leon S. Kennedy. He's not dead, I just love remembering him.
If you look like this my DMs are open.
Life is pain. But I brought cake and I can sing.
This is a quiet day. Only 3 meetings between 11:00 and 11:30.
How does that work? Usually, the answer involves dark magic and far too many tentacles for comfort.
I'm trying to be smarter and it's not going well.
Why can't all events have "Bone" in the name?
If you thought I would be good at certain maps after testing on them 8 hours a day for weeks on end...you are wrong.
I loved the two-sided story for CRESCENDO! I'm hoping we get more in the future like this.

"What a fine night for having a lovely stroll in a decrepit auto parts yard. It seems some fine folks are even hard at work, servicing some motors or whatnot. Say, who's this fine gentleman charging at me at full speed?" -Thomas' last words.
4 Jeff running Aftercare meta when?
To all Sadako "Rotten Remains" players - and YOU, too -  I share this message: "Don't give up, skeleton!"
To the players that give the other team a break when they are dominating: keep being awesome!
Working on the Archives this long has been a joy! Here's for more lore!
6 years already? Time flies when you're living on the edge!
The Entity is watching. Just to be sure... shut that closet and look under the bed tonight...
Some of y'all really need a good bonking
Come on in, have a bite of some cake
Don't forget to smile
Sending you to the Cage of Atonement is going to hurt me more than it's going to hurt you

Jonah finally picked the lock open of the basement chest. A chill ran down his spine, as he found nothing but a torn note inside. Inscribed was the sequence:
72,6D,34,47,48,6D,4C,51,77,2D,45.
Dwight exclaimed "What could it possibly mean?!"
To practice my hatchets, I made a playground in the game editor with snowmen as targets. Don't tell my boss.

Ever get those crows from staying still too long? In code, the rate at which you get them is referred to as the "ChickenShitModifier".

The more you know!

I love Mythology and Legends so when I was a player of Dead by Daylight and the Krampus Skin came up I knew it was one I had to get! To this day its my favourite outfit, shortly followed by Oni's Minotaur! If only I was good enough at Trapper to play with it more.
They say this image is the last thing you see before you die...
The Artist really has a pretty long neck, doesn't she? I think it's at least a full foot, maybe 2.
''Hello, we've been trying to reach you concerning your vehicle's extended warranty.''

The past 6 years have truly been amazing. I'm grateful to have been a part of everything that we've done, and to everyone on the project and our community for making Dead by Daylight what it is. To Dead by Daylight, and many more years to come!
Tora, this is your reminder to ready up after this match!

Don't worry, I've got you - I have a flashlight!
Successfully blinds the Killer but does not get the save
... DAMMIT!
Sacrificing my colleagues and hearing their screams during our playtest is the most satisfying thing in my life right now.
Never thought I would be attracted to a serial killer from a game...
I think Dead by Daylight's best years are still to come and I can't wait to see the reaction to all the new chapters we have cooking!
When the club hits your eye, from a big demon guy, that's a mori~
Ah, that tingling feeling once you finally close an Epic that had 560 tasks!
Yup, that's me during allergy season! Hey, team!
And who's idea was it to go out on a team picnic in March?
Thank you for playing <3
Fun fact: Dog-Sitter outsold Cat Fostering by a small margin. Step it up, cat people!
I'm sorry for teleporting you into a wall! I just wanted to show you guys this bug!
When you're a bird lover and needs to fight the urge of petting the dire crows.
When you work on a gen on some cool beat until you realize it comes from Legion who is right behind you...ready to stab. Instant panic.
We enjoyed every jumpscare video you've shared for Sadako! A lot! Thank you :P
Life is full of suffering, especially when you are on a hook!
I swear it wasn't me that placed that totem
I'd like to thank my friends for carrying me through SWF matches because, even with hundreds of hours in-game and working on the project, I will continue to need rescuing!
Gaymers Assemble!
These unused icons are so mysterious... I wonder if it's some kind of code? If only I could... spell it out. What's in a (file) name anyways?
It's hard to be a savvy Survivor in playtests when I'm usually sitting two inches from my monitor yelling, "No no! Hit me more!! I need to see the HUD animation again."
I will never stop being amazed by Dead by Daylight's dedicated fan-artists and cosplayers. Y'all are friggin' amazing!
The true survivor is neither seen by the killer... nor their teammates.
A good survivor is a dead survivor!
Yells "CHRIS REDFIELD". Doesn't elaborate. Leaves.
Which month has 28 days?
I think I SAW what you did there...
Being a part of something this awesome with a community this passionate has left me in a true puddle of joy <3
It's the hour to be THAT witch.
Why don't we just wait here for a little while, see what happens?
Watch more horror movies.
How do y'all like these rocks? I sculpted them with much care for you to hide away and not be killed
How to spot a 3D Artist playing Dead by Daylight: Character keeps circling around same random object over and over again
Brag alert: I have almost 4k hours on Dead by Daylight so far (sunglasses emoji) What?? Since when do work hours not count?
The moment I realized I was playing Funeral Clothes Dressup Simulator... well, gosh, I never lost another match.
Designing new outfits has been a blast. The drip is on!
Having a Chinese New Year celebration is amazing, I'm glad for this small but wonderful representation!
Those plush suits creep me out quite a bit. No, quite a lot in fact.
Even during a global pandemic the team found time to grab a drink in the park to meet their new colleagues
Perfect way to start the day, is coffee and gaming.
There will always be a special place in my heart for these two.
Dead by Daylight girls, it's going down!
